pages.title: An End and a Beginning
pages.text: I'm sorry, I failed you. For all I thought I was capable of, in the end I could barely protect this tiny fragment of the world. The fact that you live though, gives me hope my child. Though I am nothing but a whisper on the breeze now, I will assist you however I can.

First of all, this island, small though it may be, holds some key materials to begin to re-establish things.$(br2)Take these trees for example - though you can fell them with your bare hands, their wood is innately powerful - such that even the crudest of wands carved from it may be of great use.
